WorkItem.Description:
I have two questions

1. Is there official repo on github? I found only outdated fork :(

2. Can you add constuctor to HtmlDocument with parameter of html string and build it up using string?
Or any static\factory method, seems like
```
var html = "SomeStringRepresentsHtml";
var document = HtmlDocument.Create(html);
```

Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlDocument: Constructor with parameter of html string
